programme.title: Uninvited
programme.desc: A cat injected with a genetically-engineered virus escapes a laboratory and stows away on a criminal's yacht.

programme.title: Day of the Dead 2: Contagium
programme.desc: In 1968, in the Ravenside Military Hospital in a military facility in Pennsylvania, the army loses control of an experiment of a lethal bacteriologic weapon that changes the DNA and transforms human beings into zombies.

programme.title: Amityville: A New Generation
programme.desc: A photographer is given an old mirror and demonic forces project a grisly fate upon the mirror's surface.

programme.title: Phantasm 4: Oblivion
programme.desc: Mike again escapes from the Tall Man and travels through time to learn more about his nemesis.

programme.title: Horror Bites
programme.desc: Small tales, big terror... In this Horror Bites marathon, bite-sized stories deliver spine-chilling scares in under 20 minutes. From twisted encounters to nightmarish twists, these short horrors pack a punch, proving that sometimes the scariest tales come in small doses.

programme.title: Carnival of Souls
programme.desc: After a traumatic accident, a woman becomes drawn to a mysterious abandoned carnival.

programme.title: Elvira's Movie Macabre
programme.sub-title: Elvira's Movie Macabre: The Devil's Wedding Night
programme.desc: A quest for the mythical Ring of Vermougglian leads the Schiller brothers to Transylvania and Castle Dracula.

programme.title: Black Christmas
programme.desc: During their Christmas break, a group of sorority girls are stalked by a stranger.

programme.title: Summer of 84
programme.desc: Teenager Davey Armstrong is a conspiracy theorist who begins to suspect that a neighbouring police officer is a serial killer.

programme.title: The Slumber Party Massacre
programme.desc: Trish's slumber party for her basketball teammates includes an unexpected guest.

programme.title: The Convent
programme.desc: A group of college students breaks into an abandoned convent, only to discover that it's inhabited by demons.

programme.title: The Slumber Party Massacre II
programme.desc: A teen and her friends are terrorized by a rock star whose guitar is fitted with a drill bit.

programme.title: Fright
programme.desc: A babysitter is terrorized by the child's father who's recently escaped from a nearby psychiatric institution.
